changeSet.author: jbeam
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DataScenario_ItemTypes_DataSourcceIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([DataSourcceIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DataScenario_ItemTypes_DataSourcceIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DataScenario_ItemTypes_ScenarioTypeItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([ScenarioTypeItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DataScenario_ItemTypes_ScenarioTypeItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_DataScenario_TimePeriods_TimePeriodID] FOREIGN KEY([TimePeriodID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[TimePeriods] ([TimePeriodID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_DataScenario_TimePeriods_TimePeriodID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_Departments_DepartmentID] FOREIGN KEY([DepartmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Departments] ([DepartmentID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_Departments_DepartmentID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_Entities_EntityID] FOREIGN KEY([EntityID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Entities] ([EntityID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_Entities_EntityID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_DataSourcceIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([DataSourcceIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_DataSourcceIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_FiscalYearIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([FiscalYearIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_FiscalYearIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_FiscalYearMonthIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY([FiscalYearMonthIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_FiscalYearMonthIDItemTypeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_StatisticsCodes_StatisticCodeStatisticsCodeID] FOREIGN KEY([StatisticCodeStatisticsCodeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[StatisticsCodes] ([StatisticsCodeID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_StatisticsCodes_StatisticCodeStatisticsCodeID]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_TimePeriods_StatisticTimePeriodTimePeriodID] FOREIGN KEY([StatisticTimePeriodTimePeriodID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[TimePeriods] ([TimePeriodID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_TimePeriods_StatisticTimePeriodTimePeriodID]
